text: Further analyses with confocal microscopy identified nucleolar fluorescence using anti-NS4 antibodies in cells infected with either BTV or GIV. Localisation of the NS4 to the nucleoli was visible by confocal fluorescence as well as by overlaying the fluorescence signal onto cells imaged by differential interference contrast microscopy ( figure 14A, 14B) . Localisation of NS4 to the nucleoli was confirmed using anti-fibrillarin antibodies, giving a fluorescence signal that was super-imposable on that of NS4 in the nucleoli ( figure 15 ).
